CustomField.description: Indicates whether tax values calculated on billing document line items are rounded using bankers (HALF-EVEN) rounding or HALF-UP rounding. Certinia applications use HALF-UP rounding as standard.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether tax values calculated on billing document line items are rounded using bankers (HALF-EVEN) rounding or HALF-UP rounding. FinancialForce applications use HALF-UP rounding as standard.
CustomField.label: Tax Calculation Uses Bankers Rounding
